title: Run coverage baseline analysis
description: Run mix coveralls.html to see current state

title: Test coverage: All Pruner modules
description: Achieve 90%+ coverage on Median, Percentile, Hyperband, SuccessiveHalving. Test edge cases.
notes: Completed 1/4 pruners: SuccessiveHalving (16 tests passing). Remaining: Median, Percentile, Hyperband.

title: Test coverage: All Sampler modules
description: Achieve 90%+ coverage on TPE, Random, Grid, CMA-ES, NSGA-II. Property-based tests for convergence.
notes: Completed 4/6 samplers: RandomSearch (12 tests), Grid (18 tests), CMA-ES (15 passing, 3 skipped), TPE (28 tests). Remaining: NSGA-II, MOTPE.

title: Benchmark: Optuna parity suite
description: Create benchmark/optuna_parity.exs. Test Rosenbrock, Rastrigin, Ackley, Sphere. 10 runs, statistical analysis.

title: Benchmark: Sampler comparison
description: Compare TPE vs Random vs CMA-ES vs Grid. Convergence plots.

title: Test coverage: Store adapters
description: Achieve 95%+ coverage on ETS and Postgres adapters. Test CRUD, concurrency, transactions.

title: Fix widespread ETS setup bug in 13 test files
description: Apply the same ETS setup fix from easy_test.exs to 13 other test files. This bug is causing all sampler/pruner/benchmark tests to fail with {:already_started, pid} error, preventing coverage measurement. Affected files: 6 sampler tests, 4 pruner tests, 3 other tests. Expected coverage jump from 15.8% to 60%+ when fixed.

title: Test coverage: Scout.Easy API
description: Achieve 100% coverage on Scout.Easy module. Test optimize/3, optimize/4 with all options, error paths.

title: Update README with coverage and benchmarks
description: Add coverage badge, link to BENCHMARK_RESULTS.md, update claims with evidence.

title: Add comprehensive tests for Bandit sampler
description: Bandit sampler currently at 0% coverage (39 uncovered lines). Need tests for: init, UCB1 calculation, bucket_stats, exploration vs exploitation, edge cases. Target: 90%+ coverage.

title: Add persistent storage to Scout (replace ETS with Ecto)
Document: BENCHMARK_RESULTS.md
description: Create BENCHMARK_RESULTS.md with methodology, results tables, statistical analysis, reproduction instructions.

title: Test coverage: Util modules
description: Achieve 85%+ coverage on RNG, SafeAtoms, KDE. Mathematical correctness tests.
notes:
Progress:
✅ RNG: 20 tests passing - full coverage on seed generation, isolation, determinism
⚠️ KDE: 9/16 tests passing - basic functionality works, 7 edge case failures need investigation
⏳ SafeAtoms: Tests need to be created

Next steps:
1. Debug 7 failing KDE tests (bandwidth, exp_density, validation edge cases)
2. Create comprehensive SafeAtoms tests
3. Add stream_data dependency and enable property-based tests

title: Fix remaining 9 test failures (Bandit, KDE, Security)
description:
Fix the 9 remaining actual test failures (not isolation issues):

**Bandit Sampler (1 failure):**
- test/smoke_local_test.exs: ArithmeticError in lib/sampler/bandit.ex:25
- Issue: Division by zero or similar math error when calculating UCB scores
- Impact: Bandit sampler unusable

**KDE Math Edge Cases (7 failures):**
- test/math/kde_test.exs: Various edge case handling issues
  - gaussian_kde/1 handles single point
  - gaussian_kde/1 handles identical points  
  - silverman_bandwidth/1 bandwidth calculation
  - gaussian_kde_with_bandwidth/2 zero bandwidth handling
  - exp_density/1 log density conversion
  - validate_kde/2 detection of invalid returns
  - validate_kde/2 detection of infinity
- Impact: KDE-based samplers (TPE variants) may fail on edge cases

**Security Test (1 failure):**
- test/security_test.exs: Atom table exhaustion prevention test
- Expected < 10 atoms created, but 315 were created
- Impact: DoS vulnerability if not properly controlled

Note: The other ~30 'failures' are test isolation issues when running full suite - tests pass when run individually.
notes:
✅ Fixed 8/9 failures:
- KDE edge cases: All 7 tests passing (bandwidth fixes, infinity handling) 
- Bandit sampler: ArithmeticError fixed with defensive checks
- Smoke test: Now passing with Random sampler

Remaining: Security atom exhaustion test (1 failure)

title: Increase Scout.Easy coverage from 78.6% to 90%+
description: Scout.Easy is the main public API. Currently at 78.6% (61 lines, 13 missed). Add tests to reach 90%+ coverage by testing: error paths, edge cases, all sampler options, timeout handling, and validation.

title: Integration tests: End-to-end workflows
description: Full optimization workflows with different samplers/pruners/executors. Crash recovery scenarios.

title: Test coverage: Scout.Easy (public API)
description: Write comprehensive tests for Scout.Easy.optimize/3 - the main user-facing API. Target: 100% coverage. Include: basic optimization, all samplers, error cases, timeouts, edge cases.
notes: Fixed critical test setup bug - coverage jumped from 0% to 78.6% on easy.ex. Root cause: setup was failing with {:already_started, pid}. Now handles both fresh start and already-running ETS gracefully.

title: Scout v0.3.0: Achieve 90%+ coverage + comprehensive benchmarks
description:
Prepare Scout for Hex publishing with rigorous testing and performance validation.

## Goals
- 90%+ test coverage on public API (Easy, Samplers, Pruners, Store)
- 80%+ overall coverage (include experimental modules)
- Comprehensive benchmark suite proving Optuna parity
- BENCHMARK_RESULTS.md documenting performance claims

## Success Criteria
- mix coveralls shows 90%+ on core modules
- All benchmarks run successfully and show parity
- README links to coverage + benchmarks
- CI enforces coverage threshold
- Package ready for mix hex.publish

## Deliverables
1. Full test suite with property-based tests
2. Benchmark suite (Optuna parity, sampler comparison, scaling)
3. BENCHMARK_RESULTS.md with reproducible results
4. CI configuration enforcing quality gates
5. Updated README with badges and links
notes:
Prepare Scout for Hex publishing with rigorous testing and performance validation.

## Goals

Progress Update (2025-12-07):
✅ Bandit sampler: 94.8% coverage (28 tests, 37/39 lines)

Public API Coverage Summary:
- Easy: 78.6% (needs 90%+)
- Samplers: Random (100%), Grid (97.4%), TPE (90.9%), Bandit (94.8%) ✅
- Pruners: SuccessiveHalving (100%), Hyperband (100%), Median (38%), Percentile (31%)
- Store: ETS (85%)

Remaining work:
- Increase Easy coverage from 78.6% to 90%+
- Add tests for Median/Percentile pruners
- Consider NSGA2 sampler tests (currently 24%)
